page.name: Hosted Private Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Hosted Private Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Hosted Private Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Hosted Private Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [RBX8][Managed vSphere] - Rack R806L20/21 incident notification
incidents.message: We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Managed vSphere on the specific racks R806L20/21 has been resolved. Start time : 29/12/2025 01:45 UTC End time : 29/12/2025 02:19 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts in racks R806L20/21 were temporarily unavailable. Customers Impact : Some customers were temporarily unable to access and use their hosts located in the specified racks. Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
